thread.title: Revitalize package at So Spa with L’Occitane
thread.title_full: Revitalize package at So Spa with L’Occitane

author: Phuketindex
title: Revitalize package at So Spa with L’Occitane
text:
Home » Features , Travel & Food » Revitalize package at So Spa with L’Occitane Revitalize package at So Spa with L’Occitane Written by Phuketindex | September 16, 2015 | 0 | 
September 2015, Krabi – Enjoy the therapeutic benefits of a 15-minute Thai Aromatic Steam Bath, followed by a 60-minute Body Scrub with L’Occitane to remove dead skin cells and leave your skin feeling soft and smooth. Your treatment ends with a 60-minute Relaxing Aromachologie Massage to stimulate circulation, release tension, and leave you feeling revitalized. Throughout October, Sofitel Krabi Phokeethra Golf & Spa Resort offers special prices at THB 2,900 nett for single and THB 5,500 nett for couple. 
For more information and reservation, please call +66 (0) 75 627 800 or write us an email to H6184-TH@SOFITEL.COM
